svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 33px; margin-left: 22px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Shared representations across all 919 tasks
• First layer learns general motifs (CTCF, ETS, etc.)
• Later layers learn task-specific combinations

div.div:
• ~1,000 bp context per prediction
• Predicts chromatin state of central 200 bp
• Captures local TF binding, not distal enhancers

div.div: Key: Simple 3-layer CNN learns regulatory grammar from chromatin labels — paradigm shift from annotation lookup to sequence prediction

switch.text: Key: Simple 3-layer CNN learns regulatory grammar from chromatin labels — paradigm shift from annotation lookup...
